#D2LIgnite Great finding out about flipped maths learning at St Stephen's. Esp like the vids they're making - ideas to take back to #tekura
Day 1 #D2LIgnite "imagine if what you wondered was more important than what you know"

Big ideas at Day 1 #tekuramathshui - personalised learning, authentic & engaging contexts, online teaching & learning. Thanks @anne_coster

Preparing for #LoopEd2016 workshops on Friday - 2 workshops on teaching Statistics. Looking forward to meeting Ts and learning from them.
